title: The Slide Inn
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, International, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. International menu with some marked vegan items for both brunch and dinner. Some brunch examples are huevos rancheros, tofu curried veg scramble, rice flour waffle, rice flour pancakes, tofu brown rice sausage, and veg scramble. Dinner items include polenta triangles with vegan red wine braised root, curry vegetable tofu brown rice burger, red wine risotto, linguini pasta. Also has gluten free. Mid-century modern ski lodge atmosphere with Wi-Fi. Adjoining the restaurant is a lounge with nightly music and some beers on tap.
